decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: OS Plan; A2: Proposed Block Plan; A100:Existing Site & Roof Plan; A101: Existing Ground Floor Plan; A102: Existing First & Loft Floor Plans; A103: Existing Elevations; A200: Proposed Site & Roof Plan; A201:Proposed Ground floor Plan Dims;A203: Proposed First Floor Plan Notes;A204:Proposed Lft Floor Plan Notes; A205:Proposed Elevations; A206:Proposed Planning Sections 1 & 2
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Front porch extension; first floor side extension; single storey side/rear extension;installation of one rooflight to front roofslope; installation of two rooflights to rear roofslope.
